product_name: COSRXThe Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingIntroducing The Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch from COSRX: a targeted eye mask designed to reduce puffiness and diminish the look of dark circles. Enriched with peptides, it helps combat the signs of aging by smoothing fine lines and wrinkles, leaving the under-eye area refreshed.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyesBrightens the undereye area by reducing appearance of dark circlesCombats puffiness around the eyesFormulated WithoutParabensAlcoholPhthalatesItem 2634736How To UseOn clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed.Two ways Usage:Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your noseCrow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Chondrus Crispus, Cellulose Gum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Algin, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Chloride, Betaine, Panthenol, Sucrose, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Polyacrylate,Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Adenosine, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Maltodextrin, Caffeine, Collagen, Butylene Glycol, Cyanocobalamin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Pantolactone, Pentylene Glycol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Dunaliella Salina Extract, shPolypeptide-121, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTAShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: On clean, dry skin, place the gel eye patches under your eyes and leave on for about 10 minutes. Gently remove, then pat any remaining essence into the skin until fully absorbed.Two ways Usage:Under-eye puffiness & wrinkles : Place the large round end towards your noseCrow's feet : Place the large round away from your nose.

reviews.headline: Trust the process
reviews.comments: I love these ,, they are a little slippery at first - best to dab up some product once they're in the right position ,, but they work great !!

reviews.headline: Don't stay in place, wouldn't repurchase
reviews.comments: Although all the other reviews looked positive, have not enjoyed this product. The eye patches don't stay in place and slide down my face. It doesn't feel relaxing or show any benefit. Wouldn't repurchase these eye patches again.

reviews.headline: Not great
reviews.comments: I usually really like COSRX products but these are a miss for me. They're awkwardly shaped to go under the eye so you usually get some product in your eye. They slide down your face no matter what position you're in. Laying down doesn't help.

reviews.headline: New Eyes!
reviews.comments: Love these under eye patches, they do what they claim. Soothing, refreshing & my over 55 year old eyes look tighter & brighter. Bought when The Sheseido were out of stock & the CORSX are far Superior.

reviews.headline: They slide down your face
reviews.comments: I saw good reviews about these all over so I thought I'd give them a try. I like the serum as its not super stick and doesnt feel tacky after application. They are also cooling when wearing them. But there is too much product in the jar as the patches slide down my face all the time, very annoying. But I like them otherwise

reviews.headline: wow!
reviews.comments:
a product that actually does what it says. 
Saw a difference first time I used it.

reviews.headline: They don't stay put.
reviews.comments: I read other reviews that said they stay put so I tried them.  They slid all down my face.  Bummer.  I really wanted to like them.

reviews.headline: They work!
reviews.comments: OMG...not an actual eye patch that STICKS to under eye without sliding down to your face! Once I placed them on to my under eye/face, they didn't MOVE!!! And I was doing house work, painting my nails, moving around, etc., they never budge. Unlike some of their highly priced counter parts. Very cooling and VERY hydrating. The end results great! I will be repurchase these. I do like Pixie patches, and was just wondering what other patches do and feel and if results were any different. Do I think there is any HUGE improvements from any under eye patches, no, none of them are miracle workers. But these patches are definitely 10/10. Thank you for making eye patches that DONT MOVE!!!

reviews.headline: Slippery
reviews.comments: Doesn't stay on my face properly and glides down. It's super slippery. And it gives me pimples.

reviews.headline: Actually works!
reviews.comments: This is the only under eye product I have used that gives me results. It de-puffs my undereye really well and I even feel it helps with fine lines.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I just bought these for the first time, and use them every morning. Will definitely buy again, and again.

reviews.headline: Love them
reviews.comments: Ive tried so many different eye patches and these might be the best ones ive used yet. They stay in place and make my under eyes feel refreshed.

reviews.headline: Reduces puffiness
reviews.comments: I like to keep these in the fridge since it makes them stay in place after applying. However, if theres too much product on the patch they will still slide down. I will continue using them because they're the bedt I've tried thus far and give results.

reviews.headline: my favorite eye patches !
reviews.comments:
i love that you can get 60 Patches!!! some patches be so pricey and i love the feeling of them . this is high quality and korean 
 I use this in my AM routine !

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I love these! They feel very nice and cool on the skin and are very hydrating. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Love these
reviews.comments: I've never had an under-eye product actually reduce my puffiness and this one makes a huge difference even after 10 mins! I love these

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: Great for the undereye area. Thin and easy to apply. They stay in place so you dont have to lie down while theyre on your face. Didnt irritate my eyes or skin.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: They stay in place and I could feel the cooling affects an hour after removing them. I've tried a few different undereye patches recently and these are my favorite so far!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: These are great for hydrating and depuffing your under eyes. They are thin and stay in place. A staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.headline: These are very hydrating and cooling
reviews.comments: I am very happy with this product as a 39 year old with aging skin.  It's extremely hydrating and depufs under my eyes. These stay on great while I do laundry if I scrape a little of the serum off.

And I was doing house work, painting my nails, moving around, etc., they never budge. Unlike some of their highly priced counter parts. Very cooling and VERY hydrating. The end results great! I will be repurchase these. I do like Pixie patches, and was just wondering what other patches do and feel and if results were any different. They are also cooling when wearing them. But there is too much product in the jar as the patches slide down my face all the time, very annoying. But I like them otherwise
